aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Cybersecurity Risk Management Processes
Amazon has processes for assessing material risks from unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems.
Amazon has processes for identifying material risks from unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems.
Amazon has processes for managing material risks from unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems.
Unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems could adversely affect the confidentiality of information systems.
Unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems could adversely affect the integrity of information systems.
Unauthorized occurrences on electronic information systems could adversely affect the availability of information systems.
Unauthorized occurrences could adversely affect the information residing on information systems.
Amazon uses a wide variety of mechanisms to prevent data loss.
Amazon uses a wide variety of controls to prevent data theft.
Amazon uses a wide variety of technologies to prevent data misuse.
Amazon uses a wide variety of methods to prevent unauthorized access.
Amazon uses a wide variety of systems to prevent security incidents affecting data.
Amazon uses a wide variety of processes to prevent security vulnerabilities affecting data.
Amazon collects confidential information as part of its business.
Amazon processes proprietary information as part of its business.
Amazon stores business information as part of its business.
Amazon transmits personal information as part of its business.
Amazon collects information on behalf of third parties.
Amazon uses systems designed to reduce the impact of a security incident at a third-party vendor.
Amazon uses processes designed to reduce the impact of a security incident at a customer.

text:
### Item 1C - Cybersecurity

We have processes in place for assessing, identifying, and managing material risks from potential unauthorized occurrences on or through our electronic information systems that could adversely affect the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of our information systems or the information residing on those systems. These include a wide variety of mechanisms, controls, technologies, methods, systems, and other processes that are designed to prevent, detect, or mitigate data loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, or other security incidents or vulnerabilities affecting the data. The data include confidential, proprietary, and business and personal information that we collect, process, store, and transmit as part of our business, including on behalf of third parties. We also use systems and processes designed to reduce the impact of a security incident at a third-party vendor or customer.
